Package framework.control

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Broker
    Manages and controls connections between modules.
    ComponentAuthorizationManager
    Stores and checks authorizations of components (control interfaces and modules) based on their (int) rights.
    ComponentInstanceManager
    Created, instantiates, manages and removes component (control interfaces and modules) instances.
    ControlInterfaceActionHandler
    Holds all methods for control interfaces and is mainly used by the ControlInterfaceConnector.
    ControlInterfaceConnector
    Connector to the framework for control interfaces.
    Core
    The core class of the system containing the main method.
    LocalizationConnector
    Connector to the framework for all other parts to access the localization subsystem.
    LogConnector
    Connector to the framework for all other system parts to access the logging subsystem.
    ModuleActionHandler
    Holds all methods for modules and is mainly used by ProsumerConnector and ProviderConnector.
    ProsumerConnector
    Connector to the framework for prosumer modules.
    ProviderConnector
    Connector to the framework for provider modules.
